detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Every attorney on our team has vast experience helping victims of auto accidents, including car accidents and tractor trailer accidents. Our attorneys will help ensure you receive justice for your auto accident.

detailsData.title: Personal Injury Focus
detailsData.content: If you’ve been injured by the negligence of others, you deserve to be compensated and have your rights protected by a personal injury lawyer. Think about how your injury affects your life and the party that is liable for your suffering.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice Areas
detailsData.content: Our firm offers a wide range of legal services including Personal Injury, Business and Corporate Law, Immigration, Real Estate, and more. We are committed to providing clear, practical advice and support.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: We build relationships with those seeking our help, ensuring our clients achieve their goals expediciously, without undue expenses. Our primary goal is to resolve issues quickly to the satisfaction of our clients.

address: 1051 County Line Road, Suite A, Huntingdon Valley, PA 19006
valueProp: Our firm is committed to providing clear, imaginative, and practical advice in connection with formation of commercial enterprises and issues relating to corporate governance. We also assist clients with various business transactions, including drafting the necessary documents and agreements. Ultimately, we build relationships with those seeking our help and, therefore, our clients achieve their goals expediciously, without undue expenses.

testimonalData.text: This is my first experience hiring an attorney. Have to say: got lucky. Mr. Kalikhman was more then helpful! He was professional at the same time friendly. He did the job for me the way I really appreciated. I highly recommend, if you need an attorney, call Lawrence, you’ll get the help you need.
testimonalData.author: MARK S.

testimonalData.text: I was so scared when I was in an accident! The entire team from Teya, Edlira and Lawrence were there for us from beginning to end. They kept me informed, updated and promptly handled EVERYTHING! The outcome has been mind blowing. This law office actually cares about you. They have become our new FAMILY LAWYER! Thank you ALL FOR EVERYTHING
testimonalData.author: Kia

testimonalData.text: Everyone complains about too many lawyers….until they need one. Eric is that ONE. Period. We are lucky to know Eric as a person and as an attorney. On both fronts, Eric has been outstanding.
testimonalData.author: MARK S.
